scripts.test: rm -rf build && rm -rf test-build && babel src -d build && babel tests -d test-build && mocha --recursive test-build/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:unit: rm -rf build && rm -rf test-build && babel src -d build && babel tests -d test-build && mocha --recursive test-build/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:integration: rm -rf build && rm -rf test-build && babel src -d build && babel tests -d test-build && mocha --recursive test-build/integration/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:mysql2: rm -rf build && rm -rf test-build && babel src -d build && babel tests -d test-build && mocha test-build/integration/mysql2.test.js
